changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO observation_history(id, patient_id, sample_id, observation_history_type_id, value_type, "value", lastupdated, sample_item_id) select nextval( 'observation_history_seq') , sh.patient_id, sh.samp_id, (select id from clinlims.observation_history_type where type_name = 'referrersPatientId'), 'L', p.external_id, now(), null from clinlims.sample_human sh join clinlims.provider p on p.id = sh.provider_id where p.external_id is not null;
